objects.text:
• Multiple drying modes
• Energy-efficient ventless technology
• Digital LED display with status
• Large capacity with smart features

product_details.name: Insignia Ultra-Modern High-Efficiency Ventless Dryer - Smart Home Essential
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white modern design with large digital display and intuitive controls
• 🎯 Multiple drying modes: My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, Towels, and more
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel and clear maintenance instructions
• 📱 Digital LED display with time remaining and cycle status
• 🌟 Large capacity drum with dark glass door for visibility
• 💨 Advanced moisture sensing for precise drying results
• ⚙️ Adjustable temperature settings for various fabric types
• 🔄 Reversible door design for flexible installation
• 💡 User-friendly control panel with rotating selector dial
• 🏠 Perfect for apartments, condos, and spaces without external venting

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and modern layout designed to grab immediate attention. The banner background is composed of geometric vector shapes and layered gradient tones, adding subtle depth. The top begins with two large headline text layers—`heading_1` in deep blue and `heading_2` in vibrant red—for strong visual contrast. Below, a blue-highlighted `tagline` drives urgency. The `description` text outlines product features in a simple bullet format using clean black typography. The `subheading` encourages action, and the large red `price` element emphasizes value. A clear call-to-action in the form of a dark blue `cta_button` with white `cta` text enhances conversion focus. The right side features a prominently placed `product_image` of a dryer appliance.

**Color Palette:**
- White: `#ffffff`
- Light Blue: `#EDF4F9`, `#E1EFFA`, `#EBF3F9`
- Blue: `#1C4D8C`
- Red: `#E63946`
- Black/Grey text: `#333333`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern design with a minimalist color palette that emphasizes functionality and elegance. The primary colors are a clean white (#F8F8F8) body, contrasted by a glossy deep black (#1A1A1A) door and display panel. Soft gray tones (#B0B0B0) are used subtly in vents and labels, blending effortlessly with the dominant white. Highlight accents in light blue (#8EC6E8) and red (#E84C4C) around the control knob add a touch of modernity and guide user interaction. These colors are skillfully blended, with the black display drawing attention, while the white body remains the visual anchor, ideal for a fresh, tech-forward advertisement.
